title: Pixel 2 has been stuck in the middle of use and has not turned on since I turned off the device
content:
Hi ,

About two hours ago, my 2 pixel suddenly froze in the middle of use of some news application that I usually use. I pressed the power button for 20-30 seconds and the phone turned off. Now it doesn't turn on, I tried all the options, pressing the power button+volume down.... and the device just didn't respond
